CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B02

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY_ADDITIONAL.OFFICIALNAME: Council for the Curriculum Examinations and Assessment
NI Local Government Officers' Superannuation Committee

TITLE.P: 70340 - Milk and Milk Products for the Education Authority

SHORT_DESCR.P: The EA invites tenders for the supply and delivery of milk and milk products to locations within the Northern Ireland Education Authority Regions for the period 1.8.2018 to 31.7.2019 (with options to extend for a further three 12 months periods) on a call-off as required basis. It should be noted that the framework extension options may or may not be exercised.

The EA invites tenders for the Supply and Delivery of Milk and Milk Products to locations within the Northern Ireland Education Authority Regions for the period 1 August 2018 to 31 July 2019 (with options to extend for a further three 12 month periods) on a call-off as required basis. It should be noted that the framework extension options may or may not be exercised.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Options to extend for three further 12 month periods.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: Options to extend for three further 12 month periods.
